name: CredentialsProviderAgent
description: An agent that holds and manages a user's payment credentials for secure Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) transactions.

skills.name: Get Eligible Payment Methods
skills.description: Provides a list of payment methods available for a purchase based on cart requirements.

cart_mandate.description: The cart mandate containing payment request details.

skills.name: Get Shipping Address
skills.description: Retrieves the user's shipping address from their stored credentials.

options.description: Options for retrieving the shipping address.

skills.name: Create Payment Credential Token
skills.description: Creates a tokenized representation of a payment method for secure transactions.

payment_method_id.description: The ID of the payment method to tokenize.

cart_mandate.description: The cart mandate for which the token is being created.

skills.name: Sign Payment Mandate
skills.description: Digitally signs a payment mandate to authorize a transaction.

payment_mandate_contents.description: The payment mandate contents to be signed.

cart_mandate.description: The cart mandate associated with this payment.
